review_data.title: Great Deals and decent Pizza
review_data.content: The staff are always friendly and seem happy with their jobs. That's always nice to see. And their pizzas are very good as well. Sometimes they even have a promo. 5CHF per Pizza! That's not something you can get in a restaurant.

review_data.title: Yummy Pizzas
review_data.content: Yummy pizzas for less money. We'd loved it.:-)) we took the special offer - 2 pizzas for the prices of 1 including free garlic bread.

review_data.title: Useless service at Dominos Oerlikon
review_data.content: I ordered online pizza at Dominos for pick up at 19:45 with cash on delivery. I reached the restaurant little early the guy asks me to confirm my order and takes the money. I waited there until 19:35 and the checked by when I would...More

review_data.title: super Pizza
review_data.content: Ich esse oft bei Dominos Pizza. Super leckere Pizza mit grosser Auswahl. Empfehlenswert ist das Cheezy Bread.

review_data.title: Standartisiert
review_data.content: Wer Domino's sonst in der Welt mag, mag auch diesen. Bei Pizzas sind die Geschmäcker verschieden: Mal knackiger, mal pampiger...More

review_data.title: Sometimes you just want a familar US food...
review_data.content: Same chain as the US, Tastes exactly the same. Always fast and fresh, the have quite a few specials online and occasionally have really good specials that they email out. It would be nice if they offered a thin crust pizza!
